Posts.Content: With my 2nd chemotherapy treatment also had infusion for calcium. Haven't been sick this time but feel nausious all the time. Now day 5 and still have no energy also very dizzy this morning. My husband took my blood pressure which was 77/60 which is very low. I taje blood pressure tablets nor.ally for high bloid pressure. Is this normal ?
Posts.Title: Very low blood pressure 77/60 is this normal during chemotherapy

Posts.Content: Blood pressure back to normal now 125/91
Posts.Title: Very low blood pressure 77/60 is this normal during chemotherapy
